ProductInfo.Features:
Powerful Dual Core CPU and DDR3 RAM keep things running smoothly and a high performance GPU enables great 3D graphics. The 7-inch 1024x600 multi-touch display keeps things looking amazing.
Runs full featured Google Android 4.2 operating system including Google Play store, giving you accesss to a wealth of apps and games. Support for MS Office Word, PowerPoint, and Excel files.
4GB Internal Storage and a microSD slot that supports up to 32GB cards lets you store plenty of videos, music, apps, and more on your tablet
Fast 802.11b/g/n wireless and dual webcams keep you connected
Uncompromising customer service and support. We are comitted to your satisfaction. Contact us anytime!
ProductInfo.Name: Techege 1.2 Ghz, Android 4.2, 7" Multi-Touch LCD Display, Dual Camera, Lightweight Tablet PC w/ Google Play and Microsoft Office Support (Black)
